languages.text: {n}Паскаль почтительно склоняет голову перед благородным мертвецом и с благоговением прикасается кончиком клешни мехадендрита к его усохшему телу.{/n} "Почтенный подвижник, благодарю тебя, что являешь нам истинность максимы Генерал-Фабрикатора Пекровара — смерть не есть предел служению для ревностного духа".

{n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль почтительно склоняет голову перед благородным мертвецом и с благоговением прикасается кончиком клешни мехадендрита к его усохшему телу.{/n} "Почтенный подвижник, благодарю тебя, что являешь нам истинность максимы Генерал-Фабрикатора Пекровара — смерть не есть предел служению для ревностного духа".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the interred man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator-General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

{n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the interred man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator-General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

{n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the interred man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator-General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

{n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the interred man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator-General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

{n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

{n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal neigt respektvoll den Kopf vor dem Toten und berührt die vertrocknete Leiche vorsichtig mit der Spitze seines Mechadendriten.{/n} "Verehrter Anhänger, ich danke Euch, dass Ihr uns die Wahrheit der Maxime von Manufactor Principalis Pechrovahr gezeigt habt: Der Tod ist nicht das Ende der Dienste eines entschlossenen Geistes."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal neigt respektvoll den Kopf vor dem bestatteten Mann und berührt die vertrocknete Leiche vorsichtig mit der Spitze seines Mechadendriten.{/n} "Verehrter Anhänger, ich danke Euch, dass Ihr uns die Wahrheit der Maxime von Manufactor Principalis Pechrovahr gezeigt habt: Der Tod ist nicht das Ende der Dienste eines entschlossenen Geistes."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal incline respectueusement la tête devant l'homme et effleure délicatement son corps desséché du bout de l'une de ses mécadendrites.{/n} « Honorable membre, merci de nous montrer la vérité de la maxime du fabricator général Pechrovahr : la mort ne met pas fin au service d'un esprit déterminé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal incline respectueusement la tête devant l'homme et effleure délicatement son corps desséché du bout de l'une de ses mécadendrites.{/n} « Honorable membre, merci de nous montrer la vérité de la maxime du fabricator général Pechrovahr : la mort ne met pas fin au service d'un esprit déterminé. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡看着这具干尸，恭敬地低下了头，用机械触须的尖端小心翼翼地抚摸着干瘪的躯体。{/n}“尊敬的教友，感谢你让我们看到了铸造将军佩奇罗瓦的真谛——死亡并不会结束灵魂的服务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡看着这具干尸，恭敬地低下了头，用机械触须的尖端小心翼翼地抚摸着干瘪的躯体。{/n}“尊敬的教友，感谢你让我们看到了铸造将军佩奇罗瓦的真谛——死亡并不会结束灵魂的服务。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは死亡した男に敬意をこめて頭を下げ、機械触手の先端で皺の寄った遺体にそっと触れた。{/n}「名誉ある門下生、製造総司令ペクロヴァールの格率の真実を示してくれて礼を言う。死によって突き動かされし魂の奉仕が終わることはない、という格率を」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは埋葬された男に敬意をこめて頭を下げ、機械触手の先端で皺の寄った遺体にそっと触れた。{/n}「名誉ある門下生、製造総司令ペクロヴァールの格率の真実を示してくれて礼を言う。死によって突き動かされし魂の奉仕が終わることはない、という格率を」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal inclina respetuosamente la cabeza ante el muerto y toca delicadamente su marchito cuerpo con la punta de su mecadendrita.{/n} «Honorable adepto, gracias por encarnar el lema del Fabricator General Pechrovahr: la muerte no pone fin al servicio de un espíritu comprometido».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal inclina respetuosamente la cabeza ante el hombre sepultado y toca delicadamente su marchito cuerpo con la punta de su mecadendrita.{/n} «Honorable adepto, gracias por encarnar el lema del Fabricator General Pechrovahr: la muerte no pone fin al servicio de un espíritu comprometido».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, ölü adamın önünde hürmetle başını eğiyor ve buruşmuş cesede mekadentritinin ucuyla dikkatle dokunuyor.{/n} "Onurlu yoldaşım, bize Tümfabrikatör Pechrovahr'ın 'Gayretkeş bir kulun hizmeti, ölümde bile sona ermez' vecizesinin doğruluğunu gösterdiğin için müteşekkirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal respectfully bows his head before the dead man and carefully touches the shrivelled body with the tip of his mechadendrite.{/n} "Honoured adherent, I thank you for showing us the truth of Fabricator General Pechrovahr's maxim: death does not end the service of a spirit driven."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, ölü adamın önünde hürmetle başını eğiyor ve buruşmuş cesede mekadentritinin ucuyla dikkatle dokunuyor.{/n} "Onurlu yoldaşım, bize Tümfabrikatör Pechrovahr'ın 'Gayretkeş bir kulun hizmeti, ölümde bile sona ermez' vecizesinin doğruluğunu gösterdiğin için müteşekkirim."
